document: <sentence id="s1" text="Overall, our findings establish RASSF4 as a tumor-suppressive hub in MM and provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib to treat patients with tumors exhibiting low RASSF4 expression.Significance: These findings provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib in patients with multiple myeloma whose tumors exhibit low RASSF4 expression.">
